item.description:
Please join us for dinner at Sichuan Gourmet in Brookline (Green C-line next stop after Kennmore).

Sichuan Gourmet has great spicy dishes. Ma3La4 haha!

Looking forward to seeing new faces and old friends; Hope you'll join us for fun and conversation.

(we will split the tab evenly, please plan to have cash enough to cover between $10 and $20)

Sichuan Gourmet
1006 Beacon Street, Brookline, MA
(617) 277-4226
http://www.laosichuan...


Please RSVP responsibly so that we can make an accurate reservation
item.how_to_find_us: Ask at the front for our meetup group.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Sichuan Gourmet Brookline Dinner Table
